tool_description: Coronavirus API with free COVID-19 live updates. The best free coronavirus API and COVID-19 update source. Programmatically access live corona virus updates for statistics with historical data, maps, charts, graphs. COVID-19 API and corona virus live updates.
name: coronavirus map
title: coronavirus map

api_list.name: Report by region
api_list.description: Get latest report about coronavirus situation in region

api_list.name: All spots for region
api_list.description: Returns all known case spots for selected region
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-map.p.rapidapi.com/v1/spots/region?region=china"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-map.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List all regions
api_list.code:

url = "https://coronavirus-map.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/regions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-map.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
